nodes.text: Cargo Pad 119-Grek was a cargo pad located on the planet Kashyyyk, used by the Galactic Empire for the nearby Imperial Refinery. The cargo pad was attacked by Saw Gerrera's Partisans in their attempt to liberate the Wookiee prisoners at the refinery.

Cargo Pad 119-Grek appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment. In a gameplay demo video released by Electronic Arts prior to the game's release, the cargo pad was named "Cargo Pad 119-Gamma."
